Text: COMPLICIT  After South Sudan's government halted oil production in 2012 amid a dispute with Khartoum, shortfalls in US dollars made importing goods next to impossible, so the government secured $922 million through oil-backed loans from Qatar National Bank and Stanbic Bank to finance procurement.
Cause: COMPLICIT  After South Sudan's government halted oil production in 2012 amid a dispute with Khartoum, shortfalls in US dollars made importing goods next to impossible
Effect: the government secured $922 million through oil-backed loans from Qatar National Bank and Stanbic Bank to finance procurement.
Sentence: <e1>COMPLICIT  After South Sudan's government halted oil production in 2012 amid a dispute with Khartoum, shortfalls in US dollars made importing goods next to impossible</e1>, so <e2>the government secured $922 million through oil-backed loans from Qatar National Bank and Stanbic Bank to finance procurement.</e2>
